text.textblock: Also Beginning on the North line of A-30 at a point which lies N. 88
E., 7300 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-30; Thence, N. 88
E., 300 feet; Thence, Westerly, approximately 600 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of A-30 at a point which lies N. 88
E., 7700 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-30; Thence, N. 88
E., 811.83 feet; Thence, S. 18
W., 1012.93 feet; Thence, N. 77
W., 650 feet; Thence, West, 300 feet; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 1250 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 88
E., 300 feet, along the North line of A-30; Thence, Easterly, approximately 1000 feet along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of A-30 at a point which lies N. 87

E., 6550 feet from the Northwest corner of the Henry Binns survey, A-6; Thence, Northwesterly and Northeasterly, approximately 11,000 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 85
E., 700 feet; Thence, S. 42
W., 4900 feet; Thence, S. 37
E., 1425 feet; Thence, S. 32
E., 657 feet; Thence, S. 87
W., 766 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
F. P. Elliott; A-18.
Portion:
Part of said A-18 described as follows: Beginning on the North line of said A-18 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 4488.81 feet, from the Northwest corner of said A-18, Thence, N. 86
E., 3500 feet, along the North line of said A-18; Thence, S. 21
W., 2352.86 feet; Thence, S. 14
W., 400 feet; S. 14
E., 1250 feet; Thence, S. 33
E., 2500 feet; Thence, S. 14
E., 1150 feet; Thence, S. 88
W., 811.83 feet, along the South line of said A-18; Thence, Northwesterly, approximately 11,750 feet, along the easterly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of said A-18 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 2500 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-18; Thence, N. 86
E., 988.81 feet, along the North line of said A-18; Thence, Southeasterly and Northeasterly approximately 500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, N. 86
E., 600 feet, along the North line of A-18; Thence, Southeasterly 11,800 feet, along the westerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 88
W., 300 feet, along the South line of said A-18; Thence, Northwesterly and Southwesterly, 800 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 88
W., 1300 feet, along the South line of A-18; Thence, N. 16
W., 3455.80 feet; Thence, N. 00
W., 1900 feet; Thence, N. 60
W., 1850 feet; Thence, N. 48
W., 1006.93 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the North line of said A-18 at a point which lies N. 86
E., 3588.81 feet from the Northwest corner of said A-18; Thence, N. 86
E., 100 feet, along the North line of said A-18; Thence, Westerly, 150 feet, along the northerly gradient boundary of Village Creek, to the Point of Beginning.
Also Beginning on the South line of said A-18 at a point which lies N. 88
E., 6850 feet from the Southwest corner of said A-18; Thence, Northeasterly and Southeasterly, approximately 500 feet, along the southerly gradient boundary of Village Creek; Thence, S. 88
W., 300 feet, to the Point of Beginning.
Survey and Abstract No.:
A.A. Burell; A-5.
